content:
ICscHostObject2 Interface

Definition

Defines an interface that allows the Csc task to communicate with the host integrated development environment (IDE).

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public interface ICscHostObject2 : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskHost, Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Hosting.ICscHostObject
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute GuidAttribute InterfaceTypeAttribute

Remarks

This interface allows the Csc task to delegate project compilation to the IDE rather than using command line compilers.

Methods

SetWin32Manifest(String)

Specifies a manifest file to insert into the assembly.

public bool SetWin32Manifest (string win32Manifest);
Parameters
win32Manifest
String

The name of the manifest to insert into the assembly.

Returns
Boolean

true if the method was successful; otherwise, false.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute GuidAttribute InterfaceTypeAttribute
